text: Shamil Kamil (born 1 July 1947) is a former Iraqi football forward who played for Iraq in the 1972 AFC Asian Cup. Kamil played for the national team between 1971 and 1972. ==Career statistics== ===International goals=== Scores and results list Iraq's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:100%;" !
